en_text: Demon Kings are human, yet they are not.

google_translated: What is the human being, but not human

en_text: You become a Demon King through tweaks in your body's internal mana.

google_translated: It is the existence that adjustment is added to mana in the body

en_text: So they can be born as many times as necessary.
jp_text: だから　何度でも生み出せる

en_text: If there doesn't seem to be a remote possibility of the Demon King working out, He kills it and waits about 100 years or so.
jp_text: うまく行きそうもない時は　殺して　まだ百年ほど待つ
google_translated: When I'm not going to go well, I will kill and wait for a hundred years

en_text: God has been repeating that process for ages.

google_translated: God has repeated such a thing

en_text: If humans are selfish, then so is God, eh?
